title: Mr. Yuan is Always Unhappy - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Mature   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama CD   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Clingy Lover   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Famous Parents   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Persistent Love Interests   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz
author: Xu Xu Tu Zhi   徐徐图之   徐徐圖之
description:
Mr. Zheng (top) who stands at 186cm has liked women with fair skin and big boobs for 30 years. Out of nowhere, he found himself in love with the bronzed-skinned and flat-chested Mr. Yuan (bottom) who stands at 189cm. From then on, he started his lovey-dovey life with shoe insoles.

Mr. Yuan has been single for 27 years and has had countless one-sided crushes that never worked out. Finally, he met his true love, Mr. Zheng. But, Mr. Zheng was a chest fanatic (purely liked rubbing chests). So he couldn’t help but need to start buying boxes after boxes of chest pastes.>
